title: BLIND Mystery Tech Challenge
description: Can Austin guess this mystery tech?! What PS5 & Series X Are Missing:  Xbox Series X vs Series S Unboxing!  Is the iPhone 12 Pro Worth It?  Pixel 5 - I Was Wrong:  iPhone 12 Mini vs iPhone 12 Pro Max:   Check out Austin on Twitch:  Vibe with Matt on Twitch:  Chill with Ken on Twitch:    Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:
